name: Eye Tracking and Fixation Data
description: Dataset containing comprehensive eye-tracking data, including pupil and corneal coordinates, point of gaze (POG) in various units, axis angles, and outlier identification.

variableMeasured.name: timestamps
variableMeasured.description: Timestamps for each frame, indicating the exact time of data capture.

variableMeasured.name: frame_nr
variableMeasured.description: Sequential frame number associated with each timestamp.

variableMeasured.name: time
variableMeasured.description: Elapsed time since the start of recording, used for time-based analysis.

variableMeasured.name: left_pupil_scs
variableMeasured.description: 3D coordinates of the left pupil center in the screen coordintate system (SCS).

variableMeasured.name: left_cornea_scs
variableMeasured.description: 3D coordinates of the left cornea center in the screen coordinate system (SCS).

variableMeasured.name: right_pupil_scs
variableMeasured.description: 3D coordinates of the right pupil center in the screen coordinate system (SCS).

variableMeasured.name: right_cornea_scs
variableMeasured.description: 3D coordinates of the right cornea center in the screen coordinate system (SCS).

variableMeasured.name: left_pog_mm
variableMeasured.description: Point of gaze (POG) on the screen in millimeters for the left eye.

variableMeasured.name: left_pog_pixels
variableMeasured.description: Point of gaze (POG) on the screen in pixels for the left eye, corresponding to screen coordinates.

variableMeasured.name: left_pog_degrees
variableMeasured.description: Point of gaze (POG) on the screen in degrees for the left eye, indicating angular deviation.

variableMeasured.name: left_theta
variableMeasured.description: Horizontal angle of gaze for the left eye relative to the optical axis.

variableMeasured.name: left_phi
variableMeasured.description: Vertical angle of gaze for the left eye relative to the optical axis.

variableMeasured.name: left_visual_axis
variableMeasured.description: Vector representing the visual axis for the left eye.

variableMeasured.name: left_optical_axis
variableMeasured.description: Vector representing the optical axis for the left eye.

variableMeasured.name: right_pog_mm
variableMeasured.description: Point of gaze (POG) on the screen in millimeters for the right eye.

variableMeasured.name: right_pog_pixels
variableMeasured.description: Point of gaze (POG) on the screen in pixels for the right eye, corresponding to screen coordinates.

variableMeasured.name: right_pog_degrees
variableMeasured.description: Point of gaze (POG) on the screen in degrees for the right eye, indicating angular deviation.

variableMeasured.name: right_theta
variableMeasured.description: Horizontal angle of gaze for the right eye relative to the optical axis.

variableMeasured.name: right_phi
variableMeasured.description: Vertical angle of gaze for the right eye relative to the optical axis.

variableMeasured.name: right_visual_axis
variableMeasured.description: Vector representing the visual axis for the right eye.

variableMeasured.name: right_optical_axis
variableMeasured.description: Vector representing the optical axis for the right eye.

variableMeasured.name: stimulus_number
variableMeasured.description: Identifier for the stimulus presented during data capture.

variableMeasured.name: stim_pos_degrees
variableMeasured.description: Position of the stimulus in degrees relative to the screen center.

variableMeasured.name: is_outlier
variableMeasured.description: Boolean flag indicating if the data point is an outlier.

variableMeasured.name: left_cor
variableMeasured.description: Center of Rotation of the left eye in screen coordinate system.

variableMeasured.name: right_cor
variableMeasured.description: Center of Rotation of the right eye in screen coordinate system.
